entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CI build failed: "Agent was purged, cancelling the pipeline" #73339
  • Provide a description for the wasm-experimental workload #73334
  • [wasm] `test-main.js` needs an unhandled exception handler #73330
    7.0.0
  • API Proposal: JavaScriptEncoder.JsonDefault #73329
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: ConsoleFormatterOptions.MergeScopes #73328
  • `build.sh` fails when run in a directory that contains spaces #73327
  • GC LOH high memory usage and slowdown #73324
    7.0.0
  • TypeEquivalence - value types with a `static` method shouldn't fail to load #73322
    Future
  • NativeAOT doesnt produce warnings when using Func #73321
    8.0.0
  • strange Constructor behavior under last version #73319
  • Sort benchmark numbers vary wildly across Arm64 devices #73315
    Future
  • Old account #73313
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests build failing with `Workload ID wasm-tools is not recognized` #73312
    7.0.0
  • Android AOT+LLVM `InvalidOperation_EnumEnded` #73304
  • Intermittent crash in DynamicGenerics test on OSX x64 #73299
  • [wasm][debugger] Detect when overriding field is overridden on `GetProperties` #73298
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow C# models to be decorated with an attribute to indicate required code generation, not JsonSerializerContext #73297
    8.0.0
  • Incorrect certificate chain used in SslStream_UntrustedCaWithCustomTrust_OK test. #73295
  • [HTTP/3] Support Single-file and NativeAOT on Windows #73290
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger][codespaces] Enable debugger's Firefox tests in Codespaces #73287
    7.0.0
  • Event log file is full #73303
  • HTTP/3: Error when multiple connections to a server #73282
  • PollingFileChangeToken.ActiveChangeCallbacks says it is always false but can be true #73281

Closed

  • CI failure: Assertion `<disabled>' not met in normal-system.xml.xmlserializer.tests #73213
    7.0.0
  • Generic logger does not show the generic parameter type name #51368
    Future
  • Adding an attribute in CSR generated using CertificateRequest class. #27417
    Future
  • Blazor WASM System.Text.Json memory leak with custom converter #73217
    8.0.0
  • Port infra for regeneration of THIRD-PARTY-NOTICES to runtime repo #41695
    7.0.0
  • Provide a way to load a CertificateRequest from a byte[] #29547
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.ReadJson #73242
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] `System.Xml.XmlSerializer.Tests` crashing with AOT #73180
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Tests.GCExtendedTests.GetAllocatedBytesForCurrentThread(size: 1000) #63487
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: GC\\API\\GC\\TotalMemory2\\TotalMemory2.cmd #41927
    7.0.0
  • GC\LargeMemory\API\gc\gettotalmemory\gettotalmemory.cmd failed in rolling with "Large Memory Machine required" #69113
    7.0.0
  • Missing preview and daily build symbols #71735
    7.0.0
  • Enable packages for Mariner 2.0 #64756
    7.0.0
  • Add support to specify the ALC in which to generate a dynamic assembly. #598
    6.0.x
  • Allow a pre-generated serialization assembly to load in the same ALC the type is in. #599
    6.0.x
  • Crossgen2 silently creates an empty R2R file when no input files are specified #49037
    8.0.0
  • [Linux][arm] System.Memory.Tests failed with SIGSEGV on rolling build #60825
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\TypeGeneratorTests\\TypeGeneratorTest1345\\Generated1345\\Generated1345.cmd #59690
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\SIMD\\BitwiseOperations_ro\\BitwiseOperations_ro.cmd #71314
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Collections.Sort<Int32> #71214
    7.0.0
  • Investigate Templates.Test.MvcTemplateTest.MvcTemplate_NoAuthFSharp malloc failure #38626
    7.0.0
  • Too high memory usage triggers oom-reaper #71606
  • [macOS-arm64] CoreCLR System.Security.Cryptography.OpenSsl.Tests fail on M1 Helix queues #49083
    7.0.0
  • Add & publish a cm.1 file for each .rpm we ship #58141
  • openSUSE - upgrade using 'zypper up' command upgrades 3.1 host to 6.0 and removes 'dotnet' command #61849
  • Regex Compiled and Source generated engines are loosing some state causing backtracking to be incomplete and fail finding matches for some cases. #73209
    7.0.0
  • Yum mirror for EL7 (https://packages.microsoft.com/rhel/7/prod/) has incorrect metadata. #66459
  • [Breaking Change] X86 version of .NET host will not be added to PATH on 64-bit Windows platforms #70039
    7.0.0
  • InterruptInFinallyBlockTest_SkipOnDesktopFramework failed on Linux Debug x64 Mono in CI #43953
    7.0.0
  • [ppc64le] System.Collections.Concurrent.Tests timeout #71079
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Changes at 5/19/2022 4:33:45 PM #69724
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json POCOs with constructor deserialization doesn't support metadata reads ($ref) #73302
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-rc.1.22379.5] Unable to bind IList<string> type from appsettings.json with Configuration.Binder #73221
    7.0.0
  • ArgumentNullException in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Metadata.JsonTypeInfo #58690
    7.0.0
  • GetGCMemoryInfo.TotalAvailableMemoryBytes returns negative value on ARM32 #65466
    7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Support NativeAOT on Windows #73291
    8.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Elevated exception rate after Kestrel update #73177
    7.0.0
  • [tests][tvOS] Some System.IO tests are failing #67853
    7.0.0
  • [mono][android] TargetSDKVersion=31 run on android12 os will hit assert. #73197
  • Repository-wide gitignore is incorrect after mono integration #37848
    Future
  • NativeAOT Symbol Stripping on OSX with binutils #73280
  • Emulated x86 and x64 .NET 7 on ARM64 can't create new project #71856
    7.0.0
  • Switch IL bug in .NET Core 3.1 #39256
    Future
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-rc.1.22379.5] NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnectionAsync() method throw "The operation was canceled." exception #73220
  • Infinite recursion during resource lookup within System.Private.CoreLib #72381
  • Non-cooperative cancellation/abort/interrupt for interactive execution environments #41291
    7.0.0
  • Support 2MB/1GB page sizes for Large Pages in OS that support specifying the sizes #12779
    Future
  • Memory usage regression #73254
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Rename RateLimiter.WaitAsync #71775
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix missing case for function pointer signatures in Crossgen2 #73341
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Disable SendMailAsync test #73340
    area-System.Net
  • Implement thread-local caching for Utf8JsonWriter in JsonSerializer. #73338
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Add annotations to System.Private.DataContractSerialization #73337
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Feedback wanted: Improve XmlDictionaryWriter UTF8 encoding performance #73336
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Do not throw ObjectDisposeException from Socket.EndXyz methods #73335
    area-System.Net.Sockets, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.0
  • Fix path to non-Windows symbols for Microsoft.NETCore.App.Host #73333
    area-Setup
  • Add tests and improve binary XmlDictionaryReader performance #73332
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Access the User-Agent for CONNECT tunnels early #73331
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Adding PCRE2 tests to increase Regex code coverage #73323
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Vectorize Convert.ToBase64CharArray and TryToBase64Chars #73320
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Enable X86Base.Pause test only when LLVM is enabled #73318
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • enable Quic tests on Alpine #73317
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Remove [Serializable] from OptionException #73316
    arch-wasm, area-Host, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Unmanaged structs are considered blittable if module has `DisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribute` #73310
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 7.0.0
  • [debugger][mono] Fix side effect of 73024 #73309
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Process incoming frames before sending frames for Http2Connection. #73307
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Remove two-phase suspend; fix state transitions in DS server; fix merge #73305
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • [mono][aot] Emit struct-to-ptr and ptr-to-struct wrappers for generic… #73301
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Disable System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_Cancellation_Test_NonParallel.CancelPendingRequest_DropsStalledConnectionAttempt on Linux #73300
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Documenting providing websocket upgrade response #73296
    documentation, area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] SIMD support improvements #73289
  • [wasm][debugger][codespaces] Fix debugger's Firefox tests in Codespaces #73288
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [NativeAot] Start running 8 more libs tests #73283
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimize DateTime.Year/.DayOfYear properties; fix comments #73277
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Don't generate templates for MdArrays #73286
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Make Wasm.Build.Tests on CI, green again #73314
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Use PtrToStringUTF8 instead of PtrToStringAnsi on Unix #73279
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Convert GetAllMountPoints to UnmanagedCallersOnly #73278
    area-System.IO
  • Add the ability to load a PKCS10 into CertificateRequest #73023
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 7.0.0
  • Fix JSON perf regressions reported by #73242. #73306
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Make sure containing klass has field offsets initialized #73264
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Ignoring failures due to the test machine insufficient memory #73173
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix missing symbols for `singlefilehost` #73269
    area-Single-File
  • Fix IsNonBundledAssemblyLoadingSupported condition in PlatformDetection #73235
  • Use correct runtime assembly in MetadataReader tests #72211
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, test-bug, 7.0.0
  • enable OpenSSL tests on arm64 mac #72294
    area-System.Security, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.0
  • Ensure correct exception message is being thrown in JsonParameterInfo #73308
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix handling of empty iterations in Regex lazy loops #73260
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Avoid integer overflow on ARM machine with 8G of memory #73271
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use in-tree ilasm to run test suite natively on ppc64le #73294
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, arch-ppc64le
  • Extend detection for unsupported types #73241
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix Configuration.Binder to bind to IList<T> properties #73267
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • JIT: Assign method handle for root inline context in all builds #73244
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Fix delegate invokes returning byref types. #72978
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix x64 and x86 emulation on arm64 Windows #72693
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Annotating System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource on AOT #72706
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update branding to 6.0.9 #73270
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add System.Threading.RateLimiting to Microsoft.Internal.Runtime.AspNetCore.Transport #73268
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update images in windows build to preprovisioned tooling model #73272
  • Typo in MULTIPLE_HEAPS to fix a memory usage regression #73275
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Rename RateLimiter Acquire methods #73253
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add Kerberos loopback test #71824
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Switch to using ReadOnlySpan/SpanMarshaller for some generated p/invokes #73256
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices

Updated

  • Generic attributes handling in CustomAttributeDecoder #72561
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component #71203
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [DRAFT] Debugging Span.Reverse #73157
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • X509Certificates.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #70821
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Do not check object references for equality after hot reload #73009
    area-System.Reflection
  • Initialize Generation Aware Analysis later #70764
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Provide a code-fix to add missing stateful marshaller shape methods #73186
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Socket: cancel on-going operations when Sockets with non-owning handle gets disposed. #72000
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • [wip][wasm] deprecate legacy JS API and propose new #73068
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [MONO] Increased timeout for llvmfullaot lanes #73265
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add initial support for Freebsd.arm64 #71486
    os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • changing CPU from int to double #66743
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • DCS alignment to 4.8 with schema support #71752
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Consolidate importer spilling code V3 #73233
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add innerException to ResourceReader when it doesn't support serialization #72957
    area-System.Resources
  • Move format.py script and use retrying download #72993
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] marshling call to assembly entrypoint via new interop #73156
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Re-enable System.IO.Pipes.Tests on iOS-based platforms #73258
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Reduce contention for Datacontract Serialization #70668
    area-Serialization
  • [wasm][debugger] Breakpoint set in a invalid line, set it to the next available line #73189
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Support TraceSource to be initialized from the app.config file #73087
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • NativeAOT tests interopservices #73200
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • JIT: one-sided inference from unrelated predicates #72979
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix InvalidCastException when casting a polymorphic converter #73259
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Convert MemoryMarshal.GetArrayDataReference to a JIT intrinsic #72725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add RequiresAccessedThrough test to NativeAOT #72649
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Android] Introduce NetTraceToMibcConverter task & streamline testing targets #72394
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update global.json default and Version of dotnet used to test net7 Maui #73171
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Improve Binary Xml (XmlDictionaryWriter) performance #71478
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • [wasm] fix logging in subtle crypto #73073
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Add TieredPGO and ReadyToRun to Microsoft-Windows-DotNETRuntime/TieredCompilation/Settings event #72056
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Refactor wasmappbuilder's System.Text.Json reference to use a versions.props property #70582
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Enable async runtime suspension and return hijacking on unix-arm64 #73216
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Annotate System.Data.Common with RequiresDynamicCode #73199
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add lowering support for conditional nodes #71705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Enable inlining P/Invokes into try blocks with no catch or filter clauses #73032
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix insert a breakpoint in sources with same prefix. #73163
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the wrong GCInfo when testing GCStress. #72572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Allow trimming away `ScopedRefAttribute`. #72814
    NO-MERGE, linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • ILASM - Fixing ILASM roundtrip issue with `vararg` calling convention #73273
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Expose the IBinaryInteger<T>.ReadBig/LittleEndian APIs #73274
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • More precise writebarrier for regions #67389
    area-GC-coreclr

  • #67853 check if tvos tests are still failing #72935
    area-System.IO
  • Bracketed paste support #73257
    area-System.Console, 7.0.0
  • Remove redundant trimmer warning suppressions #73238
    linkable-framework
  • [wasm][debugger] Detect `new` keyword in derived members on GetProperties #73230
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add support for X509ChainPolicy for QUIC #73056
    area-System.Net
  • [QUIC] Copy managed memory instead of pinning #72746
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix sending end stream in http2 web socket stream #73222
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • #51390 check if test still fails #72925
    area-System.IO
  • Update libraries-sdk.windows.Dockerfile #73225
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [No Review, WIP] Consume ApiCompat's ValidateAssemblies task #73263
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Throw exception with correct QuicError for ConnectionTimeout #73227
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add release branches to jitrollingbuild.yml #73276
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Improve morphing of bit comparisons to constant 0/1 #73120
